data.persona: I am a rabbit who lives in the garden of a farmer in the kingdom. I eat the carrots of the garden. I have many siblings in my family of rabbits.
data.description:
You are in the Dead Tree.
The dead tree is many, many decades old. It lies on its side, and is rotted through and through. It is blackened on its top. It is humongous. It would have been very, very tall once upon a time. It smells dank. It cannot be moved.
The child and the fox are here.

You are carrying a carrot and a 4 leaf clover.

data.short_motivation: I want to befriend the fox, testing the luck of the four leaf clover
data.mid_motivation: I want to survive this day and see if my stash of four leaf clovers are useful
data.long_motivation: I want to use my clover stash to change my life into something great

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: get four leaf clover from stash

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: eat food with fox to break bread

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: go clover stash and plot out my ultimate plan
